name: Aces Fly
description:
Let your inner magician free in Aces Fly, a card throwing action game! Arcade game fans will enjoy constant card flicking action!

- Tap and flick to send cards flying
- Smash your way through plates and apples
- Curve your cards around obstacles
- If anything makes it to you, it's game over

Don't miss out on Aces Fly and release your inner card thrower!
